startactivities-heading-paragraph: The goal of your part-up is clear now. Do you have an idea on what needs to be done? It's okay if you don't know it all. The other uppers will help you later to complement the activities.
startactivities-button-adopt_activities: Copy all activities from an existing part-up.
startactivities-form-description-placeho: Let's keep it short and sharp
startactivities-form-end_date-label: Add a date if you like
startactivities-form-end_date-placeholde: Add a date if you like
startactivities-form-end_date-validation: Only dates in he future allowed
